name: sly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
deceiving people in a clever way in order to get what you want: He's a sly old devil - I wouldn't trust him with my money.
[ before noun ] seeming to know secrets: sly smile "You'll find out eventually," said Mary, with a sly smile.
